profile:
Welcome to Craft-Bilt Materials Ltd
We began operating in April of 1992 after buying assets from Wrisco Ltd. Wrisco was a major supplier of aluminum patio covers, enclosure material and awnings for over 30 years. For 17 years we operated from the old Wrisco location, a 32,000 square foot facility in the Toronto suburb of Markham. In February of 2009, we moved to our current custom designed, 40,000 square foot facility in Ajax, Ontario (just East of Toronto).

Craft-Bilt’s main business is contractor sales of sunrooms, railing, waterproof decking, awnings and patio covers. We manufacture railing kits, canopy kits and sunroom kits. Our line of retractable fabric shades includes: fabric awnings, motorized screens, free standing canopies and canopies for pergolas.

We take a great deal of pride in the engineering behind our products. Proper engineering is important for obtaining building permits. You will find that Craft-Bilt products exceed the industry standard.

Our sales are primarily to customers in Canada. If you are interested in sunrooms or shade products in the USA, please contact Craft-Bilt Manufacturing Co. in Pennsylvania. They have been producing sunrooms in the United States for over 40 years.

Check us out on these sites as well:
https://www.facebook.com/craft.bilt.materials.ltd
https://twitter.com/CraftBilt
https://www.houzz.com/pro/craftbilt/
https://www.youtube.com/c/Craft-bilt
https://www.instagram.com/craft_bilt/
https://www.pinterest.ca/craftbilt/

profile:
OGC - Ottawa General Contractors are leaders as Ottawa's design and build renovation experts. Specializing in home renovations, new and custom home construction as well as home design. With our project management and coordination, we're able to efficiently juggle more jobs, large and small, without dropping the ball. 

Ottawa General Contractors are an accredited business with the Ottawa BBB and our CEO, Moe Abbas is a former member of the board of directors for the Better Business Bureau (BBB).. Our skills and expert service has allowed us to expand to other cities in Canada including Vancouver and Calgary in less than 8 years making us one of the fastest growing construction companies. 

We offer warranty following the Tarion warranty guidelines for all our renovations and construction projects. We also have a design center and in house designers available to help you design and build your home. With over 50 years of experience, our team has the knowledge, the tools, the skill-set and the resources to give you the best value for your dollar at unbeatable service. 

We at Ottawa General Contractors understand that you are looking for value with your renovation services. Trust our team to do it right the first time! Call us directly at (613) 225-9991!

Visit our website for all our credentials and more information.

profile:
We are Ottawa’s busiest Window and Door replacement company. We provide quality service from start to finish. We specialise in residential replacement windows and doors. Delivering fastest possible service in the Ottawa region. We guarantee our work and thrive to make every customer happy.  
We are a local business and we understand what our customers need. We will only offer you the products that you need and will help you find the products that you want.
We will challenge every offer from a competitor by our price match guarantee. Join our family of happy customers and become one yourself. 
Enjoy our products. Enjoy our service. 

PRODUCTS
windows and doors, vinyl windows, replacement windows, steel entry doors, sliding patio doors, storm doors, porch enclosures, fibreglass entry doors.
